approach: Add custom __eq__, __lt__, __le__, __gt__, __ge__, and __hash__ methods to Todo dataclass based on (id, text) tuple

verification.pytest_command: uv run pytest tests/test_issue_3708_todo_comparison.py -v && uv run pytest tests/ -v
verification.pytest_result: 14/14 issue tests passed, 126/126 total tests passed
verification.ruff_command: uv run ruff check src/flywheel/todo.py tests/test_issue_3708_todo_comparison.py

summary: Implemented comparison and hashing capabilities for Todo class by adding __eq__, __lt__, __le__, __gt__, __ge__, and __hash__ methods. Comparison and hash are based on (id, text) tuple, excluding timestamps to allow semantic equality. This enables sorting, set operations, and dictionary key usage.
